project.description: Job for cleaning Workspace (on LSF cluster or locally)

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: LSF_CLUSTER
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Decide whether or not to clean the Boeblingen LSF cluster workspaces.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: WorkspaceNameList
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: The name of the workspace to clean. (ALL means all the workspaces available for selection !)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Days2Keep
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: How many days you want to keep (not to delete) -> Keeping the last $Days2Keep days

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "BUILD START (`date`)" echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "EXECUTING WORKSPACE CLEANING SHELL FROM MOPJENKINS ..." echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "Hostname: `hostname`"; echo "ID: `id`" echo "Working dir is : $PWD" echo
set +x
#============================================================================================== # Variables
EmailDestinationList=( fabrice_moyen@fr.ibm.com ) EmailOrNotEmail=0 # 0 means do not send emails; 1 means send email
# LSFLoginServer, RootWorkspace variables... or RootWorkspace pointing to local dir if [ "$LSF_CLUSTER" == "true" ]; then echo;echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "J:LSF Login Server SETUP ..."
# Boeblingen LSF cluster Login Servers LSFLoginServer="" for i in $LSFLoginServersList; do if ping -c1 $i >/dev/null 2>&1; then LSFLoginServer=$i break fi done
if [[ "$LSFLoginServer" != "" ]]; then echo " -> LSF Login Server = $LSFLoginServer" else echo " -> no LSF Login Server available ! Exiting" exit 1 fi
fi
if [[ "$WorkspaceNameList" == "ALL" ]]; then WorkspaceNameList="SNAP_IMG_CAPI2_matrix OC_IMG_matrix OC_SIM_matrix" fi
for WorkspaceName in $WorkspaceNameList; do
echo echo "########################################################################################" echo "########################################################################################" echo
LocalRoot=/var/jenkins/workspace
# Example: LocalWorkspace= /var/jenkins/workspace/SNAP_IMG_CAPI2_matrix # FAB Warning to work ON: LocalWorkspace= /var/jenkins/workspace/SNAP_IMG_CAPI2_matrix@2 LocalRootWorkspace=$LocalRoot/$WorkspaceName
LSFRoot="/afs/bb/proj/fpga"
# Example: LSFRootWorkspace= /afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/CI_ws/SNAP_IMG_CAPI2_matrix (@2 name is not planned in $LSFRoot/framework/CI_ws) LSFRootWorkspace="$LSFRoot/framework/CI_ws/$WorkspaceName"
if [ "$LSF_CLUSTER" == "true" ]; then # First time calling ssh, "StrictHostKeyChecking no" updates .ssh/known_hosts file without asking WorkspaceDirList=`sshpass -p $AFSPass ssh -o "StrictHostKeyChecking no" $AFSUser@$LSFLoginServer "ls -dtr $LSFRootWorkspace/*/ACT/*/CRD_CL/*/label"` else WorkspaceDirList=`ls -dtr $LocalRootWorkspace/*/ACT/*/CRD_CL/*/label` fi
echo;echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "LIST OF DIRECTORIES ANALYZED --> $WorkspaceName" echo echo "WorkspaceDirList=" echo $WorkspaceDirList
#============================================================================================== # Doing the rm job !
echo;echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "DOING THE CLEANING STUFF --> $WorkspaceName"
if [ "$LSF_CLUSTER" == "true" ]; then echo echo "FS quota before cleaning:" echo "-------------------------" sshpass -p $AFSPass ssh $AFSUser@$LSFLoginServer "fs listquota $LSFRootWorkspace"
sshpass -p $AFSPass ssh -T $AFSUser@$LSFLoginServer << EOF
dirlist="$WorkspaceDirList"
dir2del="" for dir in \$dirlist do now_epoch=\`date +%s\` dir_mtime_epoch=\`stat -c "%Y" \$dir\` diff_epoch=\$((\$now_epoch-\$dir_mtime_epoch)) diff_days=\$((\$diff_epoch/3600/24)) if [[ \$diff_days -ge $Days2Keep ]]; then dir2del="\$dir2del \$dir" fi done
echo echo "Deleting below named directories to free disk space:" echo "----------------------------------------------------" for dir in \$dir2del; do ls -lad \$dir rm -rf \$dir root_dir=\`dirname \$dir\` while rmdir \$root_dir 2>/dev/null; do echo " + \$root_dir" root_dir=\`dirname \$root_dir\` done done EOF
echo echo "FS quota after cleaning:" echo "-------------------------" sshpass -p $AFSPass ssh $AFSUser@$LSFLoginServer "fs listquota $LSFRootWorkspace"
fi
done # for WorkspaceName in $WorkspaceNameList
echo echo "########################################################################################" echo "########################################################################################" echo
